description:
With the theme of basketball competition, it tells the story of sheep and wolves facing strong opponents, fighting tenaciously, welcoming all kinds of voices, and firmly pursuing their basketball dreams. The sheep and wolves are united in their soul, build up their strength, carry forward the spirit of competition, help each other in the basketball competition and spread positive energy. What powerful opponents will they meet, what tests will they pass, and what exciting duels will they bring to the basketball arena?
source: bgm.tv/deepl

BAIDU_BAIKE: 喜羊羊与灰太狼之筐出胜利

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Kuang Chu Shengli
喜羊羊与灰太狼之筐出胜利
